translation.en: My name is Lisa.
I am from the Village of Lupu.
I want to be a doctor.
You bang on my front door because you want to daub chicken blood on peasants.
translation.zh: 你敲开我的前门就是为了给农夫抹鸡血？

translation.en: Don't mistake me for a witch.
Everybody out there already does that.
translation.zh: 已经有够多的人这么误会了

translation.en: I believe in science, but...
...I need to know more.
I've exhausted my other options,
and all the stories say the man who lives here has secret knowledge.
translation.zh: 众多传说里都说这里的主人通晓神秘知识

translation.en: I am Vlad Dracula Tepes,
and I do not get many visitors.
What have you to trade for my knowledge,
translation.zh: 你打算用什么来交换我的知识…

translation.en: Lisa from Lupu?
Perhaps I could help you relearn some manners.
translation.zh: 也许我能帮你重温礼节课

translation.en: I've crossed the threshold of your home,
and you haven't offered me a drink or even to take my coat.
translation.zh: 你都不曾给我杯喝的或者帮我脱下外套

translation.en: What if I took a drink from you?
translation.zh: 要不我喝点你的血如何？

translation.en: Or have you loaded yourself with silver, crosses,
translation.zh: 你满身银饰 十字架还吃了大蒜

translation.en: and garlic in superstitious fear?
translation.zh: 难道不是因迷信而心怀恐惧？

translation.en: I might have eaten some roasted garlic earlier.
Was that rude? I-it was all I had left.
translation.zh: 这样没有礼貌是么？我没有别的食物

translation.en: I'm really not interested in superstition, or being some muttering wise woman
translation.zh: 我对迷信活动没兴趣我也不是那种嘴里念念有词

translation.en: cheating people with boiled nettles and entrails.
translation.zh: 用煮荨麻和内脏来欺骗人们的女巫

translation.en: I want to heal people.
I want to learn.
Will you help me?
You are definitely different to most humans I have met in recent times.
translation.zh: 你与现世大多数人的确很不一样

translation.en: Maybe I can teach you to like people again,
translation.zh: 也许我能教你重新喜欢人们

translation.en: or at least tolerate them,
or stop putting them on sticks.
translation.zh: 或者不再把他们用木棍捅死

translation.en: I gave that up a long time ago.
translation.zh: 很久之前我就不再做那种事了

translation.en: Where is Lupu Village?
You don't travel much.
I can travel. This entire structure is a traveling machine.
translation.zh: 我可以游历四方 这座房子就是个旅行机器

translation.en: But... you don't.
Do you?
Maybe you should. The world is changing.
translation.zh: 也许你应该出去走走 世界在改变

translation.en: Travel, like people do. You might like it.
translation.zh: 像凡人一样游历四方吧也许你会喜欢

translation.en: I've known you two minutes,
and you offer for me to walk the earth like an ordinary peasant
translation.zh: 你就想让我像无知农夫一样步行丈量地球

translation.en: while I give you the knowledge of immortals,
translation.zh: 而我要给你的是不朽的知识

translation.en: the true science.
My.
They won't be peasants anymore if you teach them.
translation.zh: 如果教给他们知识他们就不再是无知农夫

translation.en: They won't live such short, scared lives if they have real medicine.
translation.zh: 如果能得到真正的医疗救护他们的人生就不会短暂而恐惧

translation.en: They won't be superstitious if they learn how the world really works.
translation.zh: 如果能知道世界的运行规律他们就不会迷信

translation.en: [chuckling] Why should I do that?
To make the world better.
Start with me, and I'll start with you.
translation.zh: 从我开始吧 我也从你开始

translation.en: I think I might like you.
So there were devil engines in her house, Bishop?
translation.zh: 她家里有魔鬼引擎 主教？

translation.en: I saw them with my own eyes.
And glass in shapes you've never seen, thin as paper.
translation.zh: 还有奇形怪状的玻璃容器像纸一般薄

translation.en: Lightning.
Strange weeds and tools.
Witch's things.
Of all the witches I've rooted out,
translation.zh: 在我铲除掉的所有女巫中

translation.en: none had such a collection.
translation.zh: 没人像她有这么多巫具

translation.en: And it had to come to this?
She called it all science, Mayor.
translation.zh: 她说这些都是科学 市长

translation.en: Lisa Tepes of Lupu was so far gone
translation.zh: 这位鲁普村的莉莎特佩斯妄想太过深重

translation.en: that she just couldn't see that it was all given to her by Satan.
translation.zh: 她看不出这些都是撒旦所赐

translation.en: I've made some small study of the chemical sciences myself, you know.
translation.zh: 我自己在化学方面也做了些小小研究

translation.en: [stammering] J-just a study, of course.
translation.zh: 当然 只是为了研究

translation.en: I-I'd never think to practice such things.
translation.zh: 我从没打算使用那种东西

translation.en: The Archbishop would prefer that life in Wallachia be kept simple, Mayor.
translation.zh: 大主教希望瓦拉几亚的生活保持单纯 市长

translation.en: Simple.
Pure.
Good.
Don't hurt them! They don't understand!
translation.zh: 别伤害他们 他们不理解

translation.en: Who's she talking to?
I believe she's exhorting Satan not to take revenge on us,
translation.zh: 她在劝诫撒旦不要报复我们

translation.en: which I suppose is almost commendable, for a witch.
translation.zh: 对于一个女巫 这几乎… 值得赞美

translation.en: Perhaps I'll say a prayer for her.
A small one.
I know it's not your fault, but...
if you can hear...
they don't know what they're doing.
translation.zh: 要知道他们不懂自己在做什么

translation.en: Be better than them. Please!
translation.zh: 做个比他们好的人 求你

translation.en: Are you Mr. Tepes?
She talked about you.
What happened?
Where is my wife?
Ohh. The Bishop took her.
Witchcraft, he said.
They're burning her at the stake.
She was good to me, your wife.
A good doctor.
It's not right what happened.
translation.zh: 这样对待她 是不对的

translation.en: Where are they holding her? The cathedral?
translation.zh: 他们把她抓到哪了？大教堂？

translation.en: Oh, no, sir.
Sh-she'll be dead by now.
What?
I couldn't be there.
I don't care what they say.
I won't take joy in that woman being killed by the Church.
translation.zh: 我无法以教会杀她为乐

translation.en: I'm here remembering her instead.
She said to me,
if you would love me as a man, then live as a man.
translation.zh: “如果你能像凡人般爱我那就过凡人般的生活

translation.en: Travel as a man.
She said you were traveling.
I was.
The way men do.
Slowly.
No more.
I do this last kindness in her name,
translation.zh: 我以她之名做最后一件好事

translation.en: she who loved you humans and cared for your ills.
translation.zh: 她曾如此爱护你们这些凡人关怀你们的疾苦

translation.en: Take your family and leave Wallachia tonight.
translation.zh: 带着你的家人 今晚离开瓦拉几亚

translation.en: Pack and go, and do not look back...
translation.zh: 离开这里 永远不要回头

translation.en: ...for no more do I travel as a man.
translation.zh: 我不会再像凡人般漫游

translation.en: [Mayor] Ah. There. Quite a show.
Drinks?
[Bishop yawns] I should minister to the Archbishop.
I fear he's not long for this world, to be honest.
translation.zh: 恐怕他命不久矣 老实说

translation.en: [Mayor] Off to heaven with him, eh?
I suppose that's the ultimate goal for you priests,
translation.zh: 这应该是你们教士的终极目标

translation.en: serving God in His true house and all that.
translation.zh: 在真正的圣地服侍上帝之类的

translation.en: [Bishop] It holds little appeal for me, to be honest.
translation.zh: 主对我的恳求有所保留 老实说

translation.en: [Mayor] Really?
[Bishop] There's so much left to be done on earth.
translation.zh: 地球上仍有诸多未竟之业

translation.en: Wallachia could be God's own country
translation.zh: 如果我有时间烧光所有藏身的恶魔

translation.en: had I but time to burn out all the evil that hides here.
translation.zh: 瓦拉几亚早已成为上帝的国度

translation.en: [Dracula] What have you done?
[Mayor] Satan!
What have you done to my wife?
In nomine Patris et Filii...
I am Vlad Dracula Tepes,
and you will tell me why this thing has happened to my wife.
translation.zh: 你给我说清楚为什么我妻会遭此厄运

translation.en: Oh, no! Oh, God!
Dracula!
He was supposed to be myth,
translation.zh: 他本该只存在于神话中

translation.en: a story made up by heretics!
[Bishop] She... she's a witch.
Lisa Tepes was a woman of science,
translation.zh: 莉莎特佩斯只是个信奉科学的女人

translation.en: and the one thing that justified humanity's stench upon this planet.
translation.zh: 她是这个星球上唯一能中和人性丑恶的美好

translation.en: You are not real.
You are a fiction that justified the practice of black magic!
translation.zh: 你只是黑魔法产生的幻像

translation.en: [Dracula] A fiction!
You take my wife and deny I even exist!
translation.zh: 你害死我妻还否认我的存在？

translation.en: I give you one year, Wallachians.
translation.zh: 我给你们一年 瓦拉几亚人

translation.en: You have one year to make your peace
translation.zh: 你们有一年时间与你们的上帝和解

translation.en: and remove any marks you have made upon the land.
translation.zh: 清除你们在这片土地上的所有印记

translation.en: One year, and then I'll wipe all human life from the land of Wallachia.
translation.zh: 一年后 我会清除瓦拉几亚的所有人类

translation.en: You took that which I love,
so I will take from you everything you have
translation.zh: 我也要夺走你们拥有的一切

translation.en: and everything you have ever been.
translation.zh: 和你们曾经成就的自我

translation.en: One year.
One year!
It will take me one year to summon an army from the guts of Hell itself!
translation.zh: 我要用一年时间从地狱深处召集军队

translation.en: [Alucard] No.
[Dracula] What do you mean, no?
That woman was the only reason on earth for me to tolerate human life!
translation.zh: 我妻子是我忍受人类的唯一原因

translation.en: [Alucard] Then find the one who did the deed.
translation.zh: 那就去找害死她的罪魁祸首

translation.en: If you loose an army of the night on Wallachia,
translation.zh: 如果你对瓦拉几亚出动黑暗大军

translation.en: you cannot undo it,
and many thousands of people just as innocent as her will suffer and die.
translation.zh: 成千上万像她一样无辜的人会惨遭横死

translation.en: There are no innocents! Not anymore!
translation.zh: 没有无辜的人类 不再有了

translation.en: Any one of them could have stood up and said,
translation.zh: 他们中的任何一个都可以挺身而出说

translation.en: "No, we won't behave like animals anymore."
translation.zh: “不 我们不要再像动物般行事”但是并没有

translation.en: I won't let you do it.
I grieve with you,
translation.zh: 我和你一样哀悼她的离世

translation.en: but I won't let you commit genocide.
translation.zh: 但我不会让你屠杀人类

translation.en: For twenty years have I served you and God
translation.zh: 作为特尔戈维什泰大教堂的大主教

translation.en: as the Archbishop to Targoviste Cathedral.
translation.zh: 我侍奉教众和上帝已有20年

translation.en: Yet never before have I felt the love of God
translation.zh: 然而此刻我前所未有地 感到上帝之爱眷顾着这座伟大的城市

translation.en: shine so upon this great city.
translation.zh: 感到上帝之爱眷顾着这座伟大的城市

translation.en: A little more than one year ago,
many of us suffered a vision
translation.zh: 许多教民在奉上帝旨意

translation.en: during the God-willed punishment of a witch in our midst.
translation.zh: 惩戒藏身于教众中的女巫时曾受幻像所困

translation.en: The devil himself came to us and threatened us with doom in one year.
translation.zh: 恶魔本尊现身威胁说一年后是我们的末日

translation.en: And yet, here we are.
translation.zh: 然而 我们安然无恙

translation.en: The devil lied.
Why should we be surprised?
Do we not know the devil for a liar?
translation.zh: 难道我们不知恶魔满嘴谎言？

translation.en: Do we not know his works to be illusion?
translation.zh: 难道我们不知他用幻像迷惑百姓？

translation.en: Of course we do.
Illusions and falsehoods hold no fear for us,
for we are the righteous of Targoviste,
translation.zh: 因为我们是特尔戈维什泰的正义

translation.en: living as if cradled in the love of God.
translation.zh: 在上帝之爱的抚育中成长

translation.en: [Dracula] One year.
I gave you one year to make your peace with your God.
translation.zh: 我给了你们一年时间与你们的上帝和解

translation.en: And what do you do?
Celebrate the day you killed my wife.
translation.zh: 庆祝你们杀害我妻的日子

translation.en: One year I gave you,
while I assembled my armies.
And now I bring your death.
translation.zh: 现在 你们的死期到了

translation.en: You had your chance.
Kill everything you see.
Kill them all.
And once Targoviste has been made into a graveyard for my love,
translation.zh: 先让特尔戈维什泰给我的爱人陪葬

translation.en: go forth into the country.
Go now.
Go to all the cities of Wallachia:
translation.zh: 向瓦拉几亚所有城市一路杀过去

translation.en: Arges! Severin!
Gresit! Chilia! Enisara!
translation.zh: 格瑞西特 齐利亚 艾尼沙拉

translation.en: Go now and kill.
Kill for my love!
Kill for the only true love I ever knew.
Kill for the endless lifetime of hate before me.
translation.zh: 为我永世无尽的仇恨而杀

translation.en: [Bosha] So I says to him, "It's my goat.
translation.zh: (姆德努 格瑞西特 - 15英里特尔戈维什泰 - 70英里） 我跟他说“这是我的山羊我从四岁就开始放羊了”

translation.en: I been tending goats since I was four years old."
translation.zh: 我跟他说“这是我的山羊我从四岁就开始放羊了”

translation.en: [Kob] Right, right.
[Bosha] "And I'd know if my goat was in love with you."
translation.zh: “如果我的羊爱你 我会知道的”

translation.en: [Kob] For God's sake.
[Bosha] He says to me, "I know your goat's in love with me."
translation.zh: 他对我说“我知道你的羊爱我”

translation.en: So you said how, Bosha?
translation.zh: 然后你说“你怎么知道的 博夏？"

translation.en: So I says how!
translation.zh: 然后我说“你怎么知道的？”

translation.en: And he says, "Well, she fucks me, don't she?"
translation.zh: 他说 “它操了我 不是吗？”

translation.en: And that's when you hit him.
Right across the eyes with a shovel.
And now the headman says I have to pay the bastard money
translation.zh: 结果 族长说 我得付给这混蛋钱 因为他瞎了

translation.en: because he went blind.
translation.zh: 我得付给这混蛋钱 因为他瞎了

translation.en: Not fair.
So I says to him, "You didn't think he was gonna go blind
translation.zh: 我对族长说 “你以为他不是因为操一只长癣的山羊而瞎的吗？”

translation.en: fucking a goat with mange?"
translation.zh: “你以为他不是因为操一只长癣的山羊而瞎的吗？”

translation.en: That would have been your fault, too.
I would have gotten blamed for that, too.
But what am I supposed to do when I find my goat laying on its side in the field,
translation.zh: 但我又能怎么办？我发现我的山羊躺在田里

translation.en: fucked within an inch of its life
and a naked man with blood and straw all over his peck?
translation.zh: 旁边是个裸男鸡巴上都是血和稻草

translation.en: Hit him with a shovel!
Fucking right I hit him with a shovel!
translation.zh: 他妈的没错 我就是用铁锹打他

translation.en: More ale for me and my cousin Kob!
translation.zh: 给我和我表弟再来一杯麦芽酒 科布

translation.en: Brother.
Look, we might have had the same father,
translation.zh: 听着 虽然我们有同一个父亲

translation.en: but you came out of my aunt.
Don't make me get my shovel.
Anyone else while I'm pouring?
[Trevor] One over here.
Ale! For Christ's sake!
translation.zh: 给我麦芽酒 看在老天的份上

translation.en: Piter!
We was just wondering if you'd spotted any attractive sheep on your ride out.
translation.zh: 我们想知道你是不是找到了能承受你操的漂亮绵羊

translation.en: What's the word, mate?
The horde's been seen, sweeping west!
translation.zh: 魔鬼大军出现了 正在西边屠杀

translation.en: Shit! You think they'll reach us?
translation.zh: 见鬼 你觉得他们会来我们这里吗？

translation.en: I think they might pass us by.
translation.zh: 我觉得他们可能会跟我们擦肩而过

translation.en: I don't know. I hope.
translation.zh: 我不知道 希望如此

translation.en: I'm told they're closing on Gresit.
translation.zh: 据说他们已经接近格瑞西特

translation.en: Serves 'em right.
Stuck-up bastards.
Ah, come on.
No.
No, it all comes down to the families and the houses, doesn't it?
translation.zh: 归根结底都怪那些大家族 对不对？

translation.en: The great houses of Gresit.
Vlad Dracula? An old family.
translation.zh: 弗拉德德古拉 古老的家族

translation.en: The capital? All run by the great houses.
translation.zh: 首都 都被大家族们把持

translation.en: And they're not even the worst.
The Belmonts?
We should have killed all the Belmonts.
translation.zh: 我们应该杀光贝尔蒙特家族所有人

translation.en: Shit.
